cards.title: Card List
cards.subtitle: Manage your users' cards here.
cards.listDesc: Here is the list of all cards issued for your institution.
cards.noCards: No cards have been issued yet.

newCard.title: Create a new card
newCard.step1_desc: Search for and choose the profile.
newCard.step3_limits_desc: Configure the credit limits for this card.
newCard.step4_review_desc: Review, have the agreement approved, and finalize creation.
newCard.debitNoLimits: This is a debit card and does not require credit limits.
newCard.minorBlockedDesc: Credit cards cannot be issued to non-emancipated minors. Please select a debit card program.
newCard.agreementDesc: Download the summary of conditions, have the client read and approve it, then enter the validation code to finalize.
newCard.enterValidationCode: Enter the validation code from the PDF

pdf.title: Summary of Card Conditions for {{institutionName}}
pdf.gracePeriodDesc: There is a grace period of at least {{days}} days on new purchases.
pdf.validationInstructions: Please provide this code to the agent to finalize your card's activation.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.subtitle: View transaction history here.
transactions.interestDisclaimer: Based on an annual rate of {{rate}}%. Interest is not charged if the balance is paid before the end of the grace period.

creditFiles.title: Credit Files
creditFiles.subtitle: View and manage credit files here.
creditFiles.directAccessDesc: Open the secure interface to directly query the credit bureau database using a social insurance number.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and institution settings here.
settings.cardProgramsDesc: Manage your existing card programs or create new ones.

cardPrograms.title: Card Programs
cardPrograms.listDesc: Here is the list of all active and inactive card programs for your institution.
cardPrograms.deleteDesc: This action cannot be undone. The card program will be permanently deleted.

newCardProgram.title: Create a New Card Program
newCardProgram.formDesc: Create your own payment card on our network. Customize every aspect to perfectly match your brand and needs.
newCardProgram.step1_desc: Give your program a name and a unique identifier.
newCardProgram.step2_desc: Choose the card type and configure its financial settings.
newCardProgram.step3_desc_fees: Configure the fee structure for this program.
newCardProgram.feeNoneDesc: No fees will be applied. We will not charge anything.
newCardProgram.feeAnnualDesc: An annual fee will be charged to the end-user. You will be charged a fee of $15 CAD per year.
newCardProgram.feePerTransactionUserDesc: A fee will be applied to each user transaction. We take a 0.5% commission on each transaction.
newCardProgram.feeCustomDesc: Define your own issuance or transaction fees.
newCardProgram.step4_desc_bin: Choose whether to use a shared BIN or request your own dedicated BIN.
newCardProgram.binSharedDesc: Ideal for getting started quickly. You will use an issuer identifier shared with other programs.
newCardProgram.binDedicatedDesc: For full control and a unique brand. Your own issuer identifier (additional fees and delays may apply).
newCardProgram.step5_desc_design: Customize the appearance of your card.
newCardProgram.step6_desc_review: Review your program details before finalizing.
newCardProgram.termsContent:
By creating this card program, you (the 'Issuer') agree to the following terms and conditions with Inglis Dominium (the 'Provider').

1. **Issuer Responsibilities**: You are fully responsible for managing end-users, complying with applicable financial regulations (including AML/CFT), and communicating terms and conditions to your cardholders.

2. **BIN Assignment**: If you have selected a Dedicated BIN, the Provider will assign you a unique Bank Identification Number for your exclusive use. If you have selected a Shared BIN, your program will use a BIN common to other programs on the Provider's network.

3. **Fees and Billing**: You agree to the selected fee structure. The Provider reserves the right to collect the agreed-upon fees (annual fees, transaction commissions, etc.) according to the terms of your main service agreement. All fees are in Canadian Dollars (CAD) and are non-refundable.

4. **Compliance and Security**: You agree to use the Provider's platform in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. You are responsible for the security of your cardholders' data within your own systems.

5. **Limitation of Liability**: The Provider will not be liable for any loss or damage resulting from your management of the card program, including fraud, user payment defaults, or operational errors on your part.

By checking the box below, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these terms and conditions, and that you are authorized to bind your institution to this agreement.
newCardProgram.termsCheckbox: I confirm that I have read and agree to the terms and conditions.

newUser.title: Add a new user
newUser.subtitle: What type of account would you like to create?
newUser.selection_prompt: Select the profile type to create to continue.

personalSteps.step1_desc: Please enter the full name as it appears on an official ID.
personalSteps.step2_desc: Please enter the primary residence address.
personalSteps.step3_desc: Information to contact and verify the user.
personalSteps.step5_desc: Please verify that all information is correct before submitting.
personalSteps.consentDesc: I consent to sharing this profile's information with the credit bureau for verification and reporting purposes.

corporateSteps.step1_desc: Enter the basic details of the business.
corporateSteps.step2_desc: Official registration details of the business.
corporateSteps.step5_desc: Please verify that all information is correct before submitting.

userProfile.loadingError: Profile not found or loading error.
userProfile.changePinDesc: Enter a new 4-digit PIN for this profile.
userProfile.riskReason: The account is considered {status} because [reason to be defined].
userProfile.pinLockDesc: Please enter the PIN to view details.
userProfile.noCards: No cards associated with this profile.
userProfile.creditReportAvailableDesc: This report is available for consultation until {{date}}.
userProfile.consultationExpiredDesc: The consultation period for the last credit report has expired. You can make a new request.
userProfile.creditReportDesc: This report was retrieved with the user's consent.

accounts.noTransactions: No transactions found for this account.
accounts.pendingAuthDesc: Manage authorizations (holds) that have not yet been captured. Authorizations automatically expire after 4 days.
accounts.captureConfirmDesc: The amount of {{amount}} will be permanently debited from the account.
accounts.cancelConfirmDesc: The hold will be released and the amount will become available again for the customer.
accounts.captureImmediatelyDesc: The transaction will be processed and finalized instantly.
accounts.captureLaterDesc: An authorization will be placed on the account, to be manually captured later.

newTransaction.title: Add Manual Transaction
newTransaction.addManualDebitDesc: Simulate a new purchase transaction for this account.
newTransaction.captureDelayDesc: Maximum: 96 hours (4 days). The authorization will automatically expire if not captured.
newTransaction.justificationPlaceholder: Ex: Error correction, system test, etc.
newTransaction.securityConfirmationDesc: To avoid errors, please copy the security code below.
